nodes.text: The lower market districts were a group of shopping districts located near the Senate District on the planet Coruscant. They contained many shops and stalls, including two UGBS stalls. The Coruscant droid spa and a massage parlor were also in located in the lower market districts, and Telcom was available for use there.

Around 21 BBY, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker ordered C-3PO and R2-D2 to go to the lower market districts to buy jogan fruits for Senator Aang, as it was his birthday and they needed the fruits for his favorite cake. The droids managed to purchase four jogan fruits, though they were swindled out of 32 credits by a Khramboan vender, Droogan. Soon after, they were droidnapped by the bounty hunter Cad Bane and his droid team. Bane wanted to get informations about the Senate Building's layout from Senator Padmé Amidala's droids. After the bounty hunter obtained the valuable informations from R2-D2's memory bank, he had the two droids mind-wiped, and ordered Todo 360 and HELIOS-3E to dump them back on the streets of the lower market districts.
